short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refresh your new tab with a beautiful reminder of why you do what you do.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Revitalize your browser experience with 'Remember Your Why,' an innovative Chrome extension designed to transform your new tab into a source of daily inspiration. Every time you open a new tab, you'll be greeted with a stunning, personalized visual reminder of your goals and aspirations. 

In addition, your most visited "Top Sites" will be conveniently listed on the right side of the new tab page, providing quick access to your frequently visited websites.

This tool is not just about aesthetics; it's about keeping your purpose and motivations at the forefront of your day. Whether it's a personal goal, a professional ambition, or a simple daily reminder, 'Remember Your Why' brings a beautiful and meaningful touch to your online routine, encouraging you to stay focused and aligned with what truly matters to you.
